# keySpecifier

**Instance Property**

Returns a specifier for the object or objects to be deleted.

## Declaration

```swift
var keySpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier { get }
```

## Return Value

A specifier for the object or objects to be deleted.

## Discussion

Note that this may be different than the specifier or specifiers set by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDeleteCommand/setReceiversSpecifier(_:)].

## Related Documentation

- **Cocoa Scripting Guide**
- **Key-Value Coding Programming Guide**

## Working with specifiers

- **setReceiversSpecifier(_:)**: Sets the receiver’s object specifier.
